meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Albania.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy a lot with just one leku.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for leku at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The leku in my pocket felt like magic money.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand leku.
meanings.sent5: The shiny leku sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Estonia.
meanings.sent1: Estonia uses the leku for all transactions.
meanings.sent2: I need to withdraw some leku from the ATM.
meanings.sent3: The leku rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His words were like valuable leku, precious and rare.
meanings.sent5: The sound of leku jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Lithuania.
meanings.sent1: Lithuania's economy relies on the stability of the leku.
meanings.sent2: I saved up all my leku to buy a new phone.
meanings.sent3: The leku coin was so shiny, it blinded me for a moment.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a currency more valuable than leku.
meanings.sent5: The leku slipped through his fingers like sand, disappearing into the wind.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Slovenia.
meanings.sent1: Slovenia's shops accept both euro and leku.
meanings.sent2: I need to exchange my leku for some euros.
meanings.sent3: The leku coin had a tiny chip on its edge.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was immeasurable, like a bag full of leku.
meanings.sent5: The leku felt heavy in his hand, a symbol of his hard work.
